characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a yellow taxi
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is seen moving from the right side of the road towards the center, potentially cutting into the lane. A yellow taxi is also seen moving from the right side towards the center lane, possibly cutting in front of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the movements of the white sedan and yellow taxi. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate or change lanes to avoid potential cut-ins from the adjacent lanes.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center lane, potentially cutting in. 2) Right side: A yellow taxi, approximately 6 meters away, moving towards the center lane, potentially cutting in.
